blog.name: uselessphillie
blog.title: no more making in the dark
blog.description: rose | 25 | ao3

summary: y’know generally i have no illusions in regards to my relationship with people whose media i consume. i understand that they...
body:
y’know generally i have no illusions in regards to my relationship with people whose media i consume. i understand that they don’t know me and i don’t know them, and so we have to meet at this weird crossroads of creator and consumer.

but then phil handwrites a note that says i hope you enjoy the things i’ve made for you with no frills and no facade and i just go. huh. he’s really out there caring about the collective us and doing his best to create things that will make us happy.

and today i’m happy, so. i guess that means something.

reblog.comment:

and today i’m happy, so. i guess that means something.

but then phil handwrites a note that says i hope you enjoy the things i’ve made for you with no frills and no facade and i just go. huh. he’s really out there caring about the collective us and doing his best to create things that will make us happy.

and today i’m happy, so. i guess that means something.
trail.content:
y’know generally i have no illusions in regards to my relationship with people whose media i consume. i understand that they don’t know me and i don’t know them, and so we have to meet at this weird crossroads of creator and consumer.

but then phil handwrites a note that says i hope you enjoy the things i’ve made for you with no frills and no facade and i just go. huh. he’s really out there caring about the collective us and doing his best to create things that will make us happy.

and today i’m happy, so. i guess that means something.

summary: I don't know why but I'm actually feeling really emotional about the lion plushie... It's so sentimental and sweet and idk it...
body: I don’t know why but I’m actually feeling really emotional about the lion plushie… It’s so sentimental and sweet and idk it makes me think about old school Phil sitting in his old bedroom with lion on his shoulder and filming his weird ass videos and being his weird self and look at him now, all successful and shit :’)

summary: I was like meh I’m more of a casual phan I probably won’t buy merch from either of them I don’t need it and then I saw the try...
question: I was like meh I’m more of a casual phan I probably won’t buy merch from either of them I don’t need it and then I saw the try new things shirt and my brain is trying to tell me I definitely need it
answer:
This is the mood of the day.

I was like “I didn’t like any of Dan’s merch so Phil’s probably won’t be my style either and that rich privileged white boy doesn’t need my money.”

And then he had to make that fucking t-shirt and now my brain is like “you know it’s good to support people you like.”

reblog.comment:
This is the mood of the day.

I was like “I didn’t like any of Dan’s merch so Phil’s probably won’t be my style either and that rich privileged white boy doesn’t need my money.”

And then he had to make that fucking t-shirt and now my brain is like “you know it’s good to support people you like.”

trail.content_raw:
This is the mood of the day.

I was like “I didn’t like any of Dan’s merch so Phil’s probably won’t be my style either and that rich privileged white boy doesn’t need my money.”

And then he had to make that fucking t-shirt and now my brain is like “you know it’s good to support people you like.”
trail.content:
This is the mood of the day.

I was like “I didn’t like any of Dan’s merch so Phil’s probably won’t be my style either and that rich privileged white boy doesn’t need my money.”

And then he had to make that fucking t-shirt and now my brain is like “you know it’s good to support people you like.”

summary: Pounds to Canadian is WILD the hoodie is like 66 Canadian here goes my broke ass 😩😩😩
question: Pounds to Canadian is WILD the hoodie is like 66 Canadian here goes my broke ass 😩😩😩
answer:
Fuck me sideways no thank you.

I’m considering the t-shirt but if the exchange rate is that out of whack I might hold off until the fucken economy gets its shit together.
